insights.blurb: Calvin Ridley has shown potential to score in recent games, making him a solid pick for an anytime touchdown. With favorable odds at DraftKings, this could be a great opportunity to capitalize on his scoring ability.

Derrick Henry is a strong candidate for the first touchdown given his role in the offense and goal-line capabilities. With odds at FanDuel, this bet offers a chance to leverage his scoring prowess early in the game.
Derrick Henry's ability to finish drives makes him a prime candidate for scoring the last touchdown. Betting on him at FanDuel could yield good returns if he finds the end zone late.
Lamar Jackson's dynamic play style often leads to high pass attempts, making the over on 27.5 a compelling choice. With FanDuel offering this line, it aligns well with his recent performance trends.
If the game script favors a run-heavy approach, Lamar Jackson might not hit 27.5 pass attempts. The under at FanDuel could be a strategic play depending on the matchup.
Josh Allen's tendency to throw often makes the over on 30.5 pass attempts a strong consideration. With FanDuel's odds, this bet could capitalize on his high-volume passing game.
If the game situation allows for a more balanced offensive approach, Josh Allen may not reach 30.5 pass attempts. The under at FanDuel could be a prudent choice based on potential game flow.
Lamar Jackson's ability to complete passes, especially in a high-paced game, makes the over on 19.5 completions appealing. FanDuel's line reflects his recent completion rates.
If the game leans towards a run-heavy strategy, Lamar Jackson might not hit 19.5 completions. The under at FanDuel could be a smart play depending on the matchup.
Josh Allen has shown a tendency to throw interceptions, making the over on 0.5 interceptions a viable option. With odds at FanDuel, this bet could capitalize on his risk-taking style.
